verses.verse: Δικαιωθέντες <WG1344> Dikaiōthentes since we have been justified ( The Triumph of Faith) οὖν <WG3767> oun Therefore , ἐκ <WG1537> ek through πίστεως <WG4102> pisteōs faith , εἰρήνην <WG1515> eirēnēn peace ἔχομεν* <WG2192> echomen we have ( Or let us have) πρὸς <WG4314> pros with τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεὸν <WG2316> Theon God διὰ <WG1223> dia through τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ ,

δι’ <WG1223> di’ through οὗ <WG3739> hou whom καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὴν <WG3588> tēn - προσαγωγὴν <WG4318> prosagōgēn access ἐσχήκαμεν <WG2192> eschēkamen we have gained τῇ <WG3588> tē by πίστει <WG4102> pistei faith εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn - χάριν <WG5485> charin grace ταύτην <WG3778> tautēn this ἐν <WG1722> en in ᾗ <WG3739> hē which ἑστήκαμεν <WG2476> hestēkamen we stand . καὶ <WG2532> kai And καυχώμεθα <WG2744> kauchōmetha we rejoice ( Or exult; also in verses 3 and 11) ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ in ἐλπίδι <WG1680> elpidi [the] hope τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the δόξης <WG1391> doxēs glory τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God .

Οὐ <WG3756> Ou Not μόνον <WG3440> monon only δέ <WG1161> de [that] , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv καυχώμεθα <WG2744> kauchōmetha we also rejoice ἐν <WG1722> en in ταῖς <WG3588> tais [our] θλίψεσιν <WG2347> thlipsesin sufferings , εἰδότες <WG1492> eidotes because we know ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἡ <WG3588> hē - θλῖψις <WG2347> thlipsis suffering ὑπομονὴν <WG5281> hypomonēn perseverance ; κατεργάζεται <WG2716> katergazetai produces

ἡ <WG3588> hē - δὲ <WG1161> de - ὑπομονὴ <WG5281> hypomonē perseverance , δοκιμήν <WG1382> dokimēn character ; ἡ <WG3588> hē - δὲ <WG1161> de and δοκιμὴ <WG1382> dokimē character , ἐλπίδα <WG1680> elpida hope .

ἡ <WG3588> hē - δὲ <WG1161> de And ἐλπὶς <WG1680> elpis hope οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv καταισχύνει <WG2617> kataischynei does not disappoint [us] , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ἡ <WG3588> hē [His] ἀγάπη <WG26> agapē love τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God ἐκκέχυται <WG1632> ekkechytai has poured out ἐν <WG1722> en into ταῖς <WG3588> tais - καρδίαις <WG2588> kardiais hearts ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our διὰ <WG1223> dia through Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit , Ἁγίου <WG40> Hagiou [the] Holy τοῦ <WG3588> tou whom δοθέντος <WG1325> dothentos He has given ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us .

Ἔτι <WG2089> Eti still ( Christ’s Sacrifice for the Ungodly) γὰρ <WG1063> gar For Χριστὸς <WG5547> Christos Christ ὄντων <WG1510> ontōn we were ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn while ἀσθενῶν <WG772> asthenōn powerless , ἔτι <WG2089> eti just κατὰ <WG2596> kata at καιρὸν <WG2540> kairon [the] right time , ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for ἀσεβῶν <WG765> asebōn [the] ungodly . ἀπέθανεν <WG599> apethanen died

μόλις <WG3433> molis rarely γὰρ <WG1063> gar Very ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for δικαίου <WG1342> dikaiou a righteous [man] , τις <WG5100> tis will anyone ἀποθανεῖται <WG599> apothaneitai die ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for γὰρ <WG1063> gar though τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ἀγαθοῦ <WG18> agathou a good [man] τάχα <WG5029> tacha might possibly τις <WG5100> tis someone καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . τολμᾷ <WG5111> tolma dare ἀποθανεῖν <WG599> apothanein to die .

συνίστησιν <WG4921> synistēsin proves δὲ <WG1161> de But τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἑαυτοῦ <WG1438> heautou His ἀγάπην <WG26> agapēn love εἰς <WG1519> eis for ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God ὅτι <WG3754> hoti in this : ἔτι <WG2089> eti still ἁμαρτωλῶν <WG268> hamartōlōn sinners , ὄντων <WG1510> ontōn were ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn While we Χριστὸς <WG5547> Christos Christ ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn us . ἀπέθανεν <WG599> apethanen died

( Death in Adam, Life in Christ) ( ( 10 3:1-7 )) Διὰ <WG1223> Dia Therefore τοῦτο <WG3778> touto . . . , ὥσπερ <WG5618> hōsper just as δι’ <WG1223> di’ through ἑνὸς <WG1520> henos one ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou man , ἡ <WG3588> hē - ἁμαρτία <WG266> hamartia sin εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world εἰσῆλθεν <WG1525> eisēlthen entered καὶ <WG2532> kai and διὰ <WG1223> dia through τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἁμαρτίας <WG266> hamartias sin , ὁ <WG3588> ho - θάνατος <WG2288> thanatos death καὶ <WG2532> kai also οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs so εἰς <WG1519> eis to πάντας <WG3956> pantas all ἀνθρώπους <WG444> anthrōpous men , ὁ <WG3588> ho - θάνατος <WG2288> thanatos death διῆλθεν <WG1330> diēlthen was passed on ἐφ’ <WG1909> eph’ because ᾧ <WG3739> hō . . . πάντες <WG3956> pantes all ἥμαρτον <WG264> hēmarton sinned .
